name: Bug Fighter (johnjack.hirsh)
description: It's not much, but it is strangely addictive and satisfying. fly around on your jetpack, and shoot the space bugs that want to suck your blood. keep and eye on your health bar, and don't let the space bugs bite! (i'm sorry that was a terrible pun) This is only for mac right now, but I'm hoping to port it to windows later.
